template_data.alt: Two stone  formations that appear to be leaning on each other in the middle of the desert. The sky behind them seems to be dawn or dusk.

document_data.image: [[File:The Gates of Sule.png|alt=Two stone  formations that appear to be leaning on each other in the middle of the desert. The sky behind them seems to be dawn or dusk.|thumb]]
document_data.caption: The Gates of Sule granted safe passage across fields of sinkholes.
document_data.name: Gates of Sule
document_data.mainbody: The '''Gates of Sule''' were twin pillars of stone near the southern edge of [[Raurin]], close to the [[Dustwall Mountains]]. The [[Sandvoyagers Track]] passed between these monoliths.
document_data.Overview: Apparently natural, the two rocks rested on each other, slanted at odd angles; they were pockmarked, eroded by the environment. The pillars carried an inscription cursing those who entered unbidden. However, there were sinkholes on both sides of the gap between the stones; those who tried to go around them were in deadly risk of being sucked under the sand.{{cite book/Desert of Desolation|29}}
